<<<<<<< HEAD
Englands Helicon. Or The Muses harmony Bodenham, John, fl. 1600. Moore, Richard, fl. 1607-1631. N. L. (Nicholas Ling), fl. 1580-1607. A. B., fl. 1600.
[256] p.
Printed [by Thomas Snodham] for Richard More, and are to be sould at his shop in S. Dunstanes Church-yard, London : 1614.
One of a series sponsored by John Bodenham, to whom the editorship is usually attributed; also sometimes attributed to Nicholas Ling and to A.B. This edition enlarged and edited by Richard More, who signs the dedication. Printer's name from STC. Signatures: [A]⁴ B-Q R⁴ (-R4). Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======

One of a series sponsored by John Bodenham, to whom the editorship is usually attributed; also sometimes attributed to Nicholas Ling and to A.B. This edition enlarged and edited by Richard More, who signs the dedication. Printer's name from STC. Signatures: [A]⁴ B-Q R⁴ (-R4). Reproduction of the original in the Henry E.
